snippet: A Utah woman was killed, and her 11-year-old grandson was seriously injured, when a yellow taxicab carrying them from John F. Kennedy International Airport to Manhattan crashed on a rain-slicked section of highway in Queens early Saturday morning,...
abstract: A Utah woman was killed, and her 11-year-old grandson was seriously injured, when a yellow taxicab carrying them from John F. Kennedy International Airport to Manhattan crashed on a rain-slicked section of highway in Queens early Saturday morning, the police said.

headline.main: Tourist and a Cab Driver Killed in Crash Near Kennedy Airport
